reviews.review: Jogo bom demais, única coisa que precisaria melhorar é o sistema anti-cheat da valve, últimamente tem aparecido muita hacker's que alcançaram o level 21 no CS:GO e conseguiram o prime, com isso tem aparecido muitos cheaters... De resto, tudo certo!

They used to show how many people were online when you were searching for a game. It used to be 300,000. Then three years ago, the winter after the revolver came out, the game went to garbage and only 15,000 were searching before we couldnt see it anymore. The pathetic battle royal mode came out, they banned lotteries of skins that are way to expensive. To add more players they made the game free (I had to pay to play)  which only meant smurfs (people who are really good, making new accounts to shit on bad players) and hackers could roam free everygame. They changed the cooldown time for leaving bans, it is a 10 minute ban for leaving a losing game you would spend close to an hour on, so there are afk's every other game, if its not the games or servers fault. They dont update the base structure code of the game 12 years after it came out, they just keep adding cosmetics for money. Hell the only way they get maps is by taking community submissions. They stopped caring about this game a long time ago, its not the cash cow it used to be. They should just make a new one.
this game is full of cheaters but it s th best game ever
